name: BrokeBot City
description:
In the post-apocalyptic future, nanobots have destroyed everything. As a robot in disrepair, you are next...

Minimum Requirements:

  • Oculus Rift DK2 or better
  • Leap Motion

Recommended Requirements:

  • A reasonably powerful computer.

Sit 2-3 feet from the Oculus Rift DK2 camera with it roughly the same height. Keep a clear space around and in front of you. If you are hardcore, you should sit on the floor.

You will start in a gray box. Hold your hands in view for around 5 seconds for the experience to begin.

(and should you survive the nanobots, you will be greeted with existential uncertainty)
